name: Gpgpu-project-webpage
tagline: GPU Programming Final Project - Uni10 Tensor Network
body:
### Project Introduction
Uni10(Universal Tensor Network Library) is programmed in C++ and geared toward applications to the tensor network algorithms, such TEBD, PEPS and MERA. We hope the availability of Uni10 will make future implementation of tensor network algorithms much easier and less error prone.
### Our Contribution
Software profiling
Implemented/refactored the GPU code using newer Cuda programming model such as shared memory
Unit-test verification
Fix several bugs in original code
### Video Link
[Proposal](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U0kBn5zmR_E)  
[Final Presentation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SrF-UZuDSLU)
